sentence.Network_en: Suffice it to say that the unusually high boiling point of acetic acid.

sentence.Network_en: Acetic acid is formed as an intermediate in the anaerobic fermentation of carbohydrates, proteins, and fats.
sentence.Network_cn: 醋酸是碳水化合物, 蛋白质和脂肪在厌氧发酵时所形成的中间体.

sentence.Network_en: The existing bromine in acetic acid could aggravate corrosion on metal hole.
sentence.Network_cn: 醋酸中含溴会加剧金属孔蚀.
